title: 2000 (No. 5 of 2000) and by section 3(1) of the National Minimum Wage Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Minimum Wage Order (No. 2)

title: 2000 (No. 5 of 2000) and by section 3(1) of the National Minimum Wage Act
2000 (No. 5 of 2000) and by section 3(1) of the National Minimum Wage Act
heading: 2. This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2021.

title: 2000 (No. 5 of 2000) and by section 3(1) of the National Minimum Wage Act
heading: It is hereby declared that the national minimum hourly rate of pay for the
text_raw:
3. 

It is hereby declared that the national minimum hourly rate of pay for the 
purposes of the National Minimum Wage Acts 2000 and 2015 shall be €10.20.
text_norm: 3 hereby declared national minimum hourly rate pay purpose national minimum wage act 2000 2015 shall eur10.20

title: 2000 (No. 5 of 2000) and by section 3(1) of the National Minimum Wage Act
heading: 4. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following
text_raw:
4. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following 

allowances: 

(i) 

for board only, €0.91 per hour worked, 

(ii) 

for lodgings only, €24.10 per week, or €3.45 per day. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 October, 2020. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Employment Affairs and Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [427] 3
text_norm: 4 national minimum hourly rate pay may include following allowance (i) board eur0.91 per hour worked (ii) lodging eur24.10 per week eur3.45 per day given official seal 8 october 2020 heather humphreys minister employment affair social protection notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th october 2020 427 3

title: 2000 (No. 5 of 2000) and by section 3(1) of the National Minimum Wage Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order sets the national minimum hourly rate of pay, with effect from 1 
January 2021, at €10.20, and the board and lodging rates as follows; 

Lodgings: €24.10 per week, or €3.45 per day. 

Board: €0.91 per hour worked. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [427]
